Title: Verify Online Users Tab Functionality and Display
Step Action: Select an institution from the institution list
Step Expected: System defaults to "Online" users tab

Step Action: Select an institution from the institution list
Step Expected: System defaults to "Online" users tab

Step Action: Observe the users displayed in the Online tab
Step Expected: All users who are members of institution and online are displayed

Step Action: Observe the order of users in the list
Step Expected: Users are ordered alphabetically by first letter of their names

Step Action: Observe the status text for online users
Step Expected: Online users display written status "Online"

Step Action: Observe the avatars of online users
Step Expected: Online users have green circle inside their avatar

Title: Verify All Users Tab Functionality
Step Action: Select an institution and view Online Users tab
Step Expected: All Users tab is visible and available

Step Expected: All Users tab is visible and available

Step Expected: All users who are members of institution are displayed (online and offline)

Step Action: Observe the position of online users
Step Expected: Online users appear at the top of the list

Step Action: Observe the order of users
Step Expected: Users are ordered alphabetically by first letter of their names

Step Expected: User can type letters into search field

Step Expected: User can select a user from search results
